fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Furniture", "furniture",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Office Supplies", "office supplier",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Technology", "technology",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category]
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level conditional mapping converted from Tableau IF/ELSEIF to DAX SWITCH(TRUE()) with all column references transformed to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. This is a calculated column since it operates per row without aggregation.
